text: Clarence Burgess Owens (born August 2, 1951) is an American politician, non- profit executive, and retired football player. He is a U.S. Representative for Utah's 4th congressional district since 2021. Burgess played safety for ten seasons in the National Football League (NFL) for the New York Jets and the Oakland Raiders. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:New York Jets players Category:Oakland Raiders players Category:United States representatives from Utah Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Sportspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:American football safeties Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Columbus, Ohio Category:African-American politicians Category:Politicians from Salt Lake City, Utah
title: Burgess Owens
